title: Cuba Gooding Jr., Accused of Sex Abuse, Faces New Charges
text:
Oscar-winning actor Cuba Gooding Jr., who has been accused of sex abuse for allegedly groping a woman at a Manhattan nightclub, was indicted Thursday on new charges stemming from a separate alleged incident.

A prosecutor from the Manhattan district attorney’s office announced the new indictment in criminal court Thursday, when jury selection was supposed to begin in the alleged-groping case. The office said the new indictment covers the existing case as well as a new incident. Officials didn’t provide details about the new...
description: Cuba Gooding Jr., who has been accused of sex abuse for allegedly groping a woman at a Manhattan nightclub, was indicted on new charges stemming from a separate alleged incident.
